description: tan card with red text in German and two applied black and white photographs; photograph at left of seated man holding cane with a top hat on table at PL; photograph at right of a man in a white lab coat developing photographs, with bottles on shelves in background

title: New Year's Card with Self Portrait, At Work in his Darkroom/Celebration of 100th Anniversary of the Invention of Photography
